1.title: Von Leipzig nach Krakau

episode of.title: Ostwärts - Mit dem Rucksack der Sonne entgegen (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: A trip from Leipzig to the Black Sea with journalist Julia Finkernagel. This journey will take the audience in 6 weeks from Germany to Poland, Slovakia, Hungary, Romania and Bulgaria. always from the perspective of a curious backpacker looking for new adventures.
